capabilityDescription.en: Sends the contents to a specified Amazon Kinesis. In order to send data to Kinesis, the stream name has to be specified.
capabilityDescription.zh: 将内容发送到指定的Amazon Kinesis。为了向Kinesis发送数据，必须指定流名称。

en.description: Specifies the Proxy Configuration Controller Service to proxy network requests.

zh.description: Specifies the Proxy Configuration Controller Service to proxy network requests.

en.description: Endpoint URL to use instead of the AWS default including scheme, host, port, and path. The AWS libraries select an endpoint URL based on the AWS region, but this property overrides the selected endpoint URL, allowing use with other S3-compatible endpoints.

zh.description: 要使用的端点URL，而不是AWS默认值，包括方案、主机、端口和路径。AWS库根据AWS区域选择一个端点URL，但此属性覆盖所选的端点URL，允许与其他S3兼容的端点一起使用。

en.description: The partition key attribute.  If it is not set, a random value is used

zh.description: 分区键属性。如果未设置，则使用随机值

en.description: Max message buffer size in Mega-bytes
The Controller Service that is used to obtain AWS credentials provider

zh.description: The Controller Service that is used to obtain AWS credentials provider

failure.en: FlowFiles are routed to failure relationship

success.en: FlowFiles are routed to success relationship

aws.kinesis.error.code.en: Error code for the message when posting to AWS Kinesis
aws.kinesis.error.code.zh: 发布到AWS Kinesis时消息的错误代码

aws.kinesis.error.message.en: Error message on posting message to AWS Kinesis
aws.kinesis.error.message.zh: 向AWS Kinesis发布消息时出现错误消息

aws.kinesis.shard.id.en: Shard id of the message posted to AWS Kinesis
aws.kinesis.shard.id.zh: 发布到AWS Kinesis的消息的碎片id

aws.kinesis.sequence.number.en: Sequence number for the message when posting to AWS Kinesis
aws.kinesis.sequence.number.zh: 发布到AWS Kinesis时消息的序列号
